title: Cairo, Illinois.  Student Nonviolent Coordinating Committee  field secretary, later SNCC chairman, now Congressman John Lewis, and others pray during a demonstration.
marks: \"#3\", in pencil, on back; \"Printer/Kelton/BLEAK BE \"Danny Lyon\", in pencil, on back
description: girl at center with head bowed, kneeling on one knee, flanked by two kneeling men; two other girls visible at left and right edges
creditline: The Alfred and Ingrid Lenz Harrison Fund
